comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Baltimore woman Eleanor Douglas Wise (1875-1932), who married French duke (his mother was also American-born).  Her father was a Navy captain.

comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: She married the duke de Richelieu in 1913, see The San Francisco call., June 22, 1913. "She was born in 1890 in Baltimore, USA, and died in 1972 at the age of 82, without issue. She had married the eighth, and as it transpired, last duke of Richelieu, Marie Odet Jean Armand de la chapelle de Saint-Jean de Jumilhac, 8th Duke of Richelieu (1880 - 1952)." richelieu-eminencerouge.blogspot.ch/2013/02/the-last-duch... The first duke of Richelieu was the famous French cardinal and first minister under Louis XIII, see en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Duke_of_Richelieu
